title: SteamGiveaway Auto-Enter
desc: Requires Greasemonkey / Tampermonkey / Violentmonkey. Automatically joins all opened SteamGiveaway giveaways (and closes their tabs after joining)

title: xRel IMDB-Ratings
desc: Currently Outdated! Requires Greasemonkey / Tampermonkey / Violentmonkey. Tries to fetch and display IMDB ratings for movies on xrel.to.

title: Youtube Spacebar Interaction
desc: Requires Greasemonkey / Tampermonkey / Violentmonkey. Spacebar now always pauses/resumes the player or restarts the video no matter if the player has focus. Doesn't work if a textbox is active. Was only tested against the HTML5-player!
